description: These summery treats are packed full of rich blueberries and have a lovely vivid colour.
keywords: Ice blocks,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Peanut free
name: Frozen Fruity Yoghurt Lollies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Simply blend all the ingredients together in a blender, or using a hand-held blender, until they are smooth, then freeze in lolly moulds for up to 8 weeks.
Put the moulds carefully under running hot water for a minute to help release the lollies when you are ready to serve them.
